short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go faster on event creation thanks to event templates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Calendar extension that enable users to:
(1) configure templates of events (including name, color & description)
(2) select the type of event when creating the event. 

Benefits: 
(1) Time saving on event creation.
(2) Standarization of your company process.
(3) Enhance the reliability of your tracking system, especially if it's dependant on event names (avoids any spelling mistakes)
